publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4486 Stewart Stevenson: Motion without Notice—That the Justice 1 Committee resolves that the Minister for Justice should deliver to the Committee two reports authored by John MacLeod and a further report authored by Michael Pass in the matter of Shirley McKie v Scottish Ministers. This motion was moved without notice and agreed by the Justice 1 Committee at its meeting on 1 June 2006.
